hints.label: lem-kinetic-energy-bound
hints.title: Kinetic Energy Control
hints.content:
3611: :label: lem-kinetic-energy-bound
3612: 
3613: The kinetic energy is controlled by the velocity Fisher information and KL divergence:
3614: 
3615: $$
3616: E_v[\rho] \le E_v[\rho_\infty] + C_v D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \rho_\infty) + \frac{C_v'}{\gamma} I_v(\rho)
3617: $$
hints.raw_directive:
3608: **Lemma (Kinetic energy bound)**:
3609: 
3610: :::{prf:lemma} Kinetic Energy Control
3611: :label: lem-kinetic-energy-bound
3612: 
3613: The kinetic energy is controlled by the velocity Fisher information and KL divergence:
3614: 
3615: $$
3616: E_v[\rho] \le E_v[\rho_\infty] + C_v D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \rho_\infty) + \frac{C_v'}{\gamma} I_v(\rho)
3617: $$
3618:
